name: tiny-watch-party-plugin
description: 小さなコミュニティでのウォッチパーティプラグイン

scripts.sync:manifest: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const manifest = require('./extension/manifest.json'); manifest.version = pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./extension/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2) + '\n');"
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run sync:manifest && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')
